organization.fullName: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

identificationModule.briefTitle: Intravenous Thrombolysis Registry for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China
identificationModule.officialTitle: Intravenous ThrombolysisRegistry for Acute Ischemic Stroke in China

statusModule.whyStopped: The study has been terminated due to key change of protocol

responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

leadSponsor.name: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To analyze the real situation of intravenous thrombolysis in acute ischemic stroke in China
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Compare the efficacy and safety of different thrombolytic drugs; Analysis of patients during hospital treatment of adverse events and complications; Analysis of factors that affect the effectiveness of treatment; Evaluate the pharmacological benefits of different thrombolytic drugs

armGroups.label: Alteplase group
armGroups.description: According to 0.6-0.9mg / kg alteplase (maximum can not exceed 90mg), of which 10% intravenous injection, the remaining 60 minutes intravenous infusion

armGroups.label: Urokinase group
armGroups.description: 1.2-1.5 million U dissolved in 100ml sodium chloride injection, 30 minutes intravenously End

interventions.name: Alteplase
interventions.description: According to 0.6-0.9mg / kg alteplase (maximum can not exceed 90mg), of which 10% intravenous injection, the remaining 60 minutes intravenous infusion.

interventions.name: Urokinase
interventions.description: 1.2-1.5 million U dissolved in 100ml sodium chloride injection, 30 minutes intravenously.

primaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of patients with mRS = 0-1 points 90 days after thrombolysis

secondaryOutcomes.description: Symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage conversion rate; Liver and kidney dysfunction; Bleeding gums; Skin mucous membrane bleeding

otherOutcomes.description: The cost-effectiveness of different thrombolytic drugs

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Thrombolytic patients with acute ischemic stroke within 3 hours of onset

locations.facility: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region
